name: Orblin!
description:
• Left mouse button - throw the orb (if you're holding it)
  • Right mouse button - pick up the orb (if you're near it)
  • A/D or Left/Right arrows - move left and right. You can also move in the air!
  • W/Space/Up - jump.
  • R - restart level (if you get stuck)

A submission for the GMTK game jam 2021, theme: Joined Together. Made using the Godot game engine!

You are the Orblin, and have been cursed to carry The Orb... You've heard of something that might cure you, the Anti-Orb, deep within a dungeon...

You're attacted towards the Orb when you're outside it's light radius. Use momentum to fling yourself around levels fast. If you need more speed, remember to jump and throw - the Orb inherits your momentum.
